channel.title: Editing Interface Text?
channel.description:
Does anyone know, how to edit the Interface test, i.e changing the colour of it?
By "Interface text" i mean like the "Quests Journal" or the "Energy Left" or "Run" button. I'm using [b]Testscape.[/b]

item.title: Editing Interface Text?
item.dc:creator: @negative101 negative101
item.description:
@negative101 wrote:

know um come to my forums chat and I’ll explain.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2008, 11:45:37 am[/size][hr]or u go into text handler and goto crl +f and search for the stuff u are trying to change. It should pull up and that’s it
Reminder go into texthandler.cfg

Read full topic
